quoteText: If you violate these Terms, the Company reserves the right to issue you a warning regarding the violation or immediately terminate or suspend any or all Accounts you have created using the Service. You agree that the Company need not provide you notice before terminating or suspending your Account(s), but it may do so.
title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

tosdr.case: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
